short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: THIS EXTENSION IS FOR BETA TESTING

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
You want to export/import a subtree of your bookmark tree. 
So this extension is what you are looking for!

With this extension, you could;

* List your bookmark tree in a tree view, 
* Edit/Delete bookmarks,
* Add new bookmarks,
* Add new bookmark folders (subtrees),
* Delete an existing bookmark folder (subtree),
* Export(Share) the content of the bookmark subtree, by simply copying the content as a piece of text to the clipboard,
* Import a subtree which is exported by your friend with this extension, by pasting the text content  ...
